H0.text: Where would a Viking warrior hope to go if he died in battle. Asgard

H1.text: Where would a Viking warrior hope to go if he died in battle. Vanaheim

H2.text: Where would a Viking warrior hope to go if he died in battle. Alfheim

H3.text: Where would a Viking warrior hope to go if he died in battle. Valhol

A4.text: The fifth and last realm was Valhalla, ruled by Odin and was called the Hall of Heroes.

A5.text: Valhalla was idealized in Viking culture and gave the Scandinavians a widespread cultural belief that there is nothing more glorious than death in battle.

A6.text: may be ferried away by valkyries to Odin's martial hall Valhalla
